title: Rocky Mountain National Park
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 240 words, Level I (Grade 1), Lexile 570L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     L and O
description: Rocky Mountain National Park is a place of abundant wildlife and majestic mountains. It's also a popular destination for over 4 million visitors every year! Each season brings a new kind of beauty to the park that is appreciated by nature lovers, whether they are traveling by car or on foot. Rocky Mountain National Park provides students with a detailed look at the many features of the park and what makes it such a special place. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify an author's purpose and the correct use of proper nouns as names of titles. The book and lessons are also available for levels L and O.
